title: Ep. 931 - Biden’s Next Diversity Hire
description:
A liberal Supreme Court justice steps down, the DHS Secretary gets caught on tape admitting that the situation at the southern border is historically bad, and Joe Rogan survives another attempt by the woke Left to cancel him.
